places.name: Maletsunyane Falls
places.description: One of the highest waterfalls in Southern Africa, offering stunning views and adventure activities like abseiling.

places.name: Thaba-Bosiu
places.description: A historical mountain fortress, where King Moshoeshoe I built his stronghold in the 19th century.

places.name: Sehlabathebe National Park
places.address: Near the southeastern border of Lesotho
places.description: A UNESCO site known for its incredible biodiversity, stunning landscapes, and rare bird species.

places.name: Liphofung Cave
places.description: A historical cave that houses ancient San rock art and artifacts, offering insight into early human life.

places.name: Oxbow Resort
places.description: A peaceful resort surrounded by breathtaking mountains, perfect for relaxation, skiing, and hiking.

places.name: Katse Dam
places.description: One of the largest dams in Africa, offering spectacular views and boat tours, part of the Lesotho Highlands Water Project.

places.name: Royal Palace of Teyateyaneng
places.description: Historical palace of the Basotho kings, offering a glimpse into the rich cultural heritage of Lesotho.

places.name: Afri-Ski
places.description: The only ski resort in Southern Africa, perfect for snow activities and mountain adventure.
